Master of Dungeons
{{userName}}
import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit{ userName: string | null = '' isTeacher: string | null = ''; ngOnInit(){ this.userName = localStorage.getItem('user-full-name'); this.isTeacher = localStorage.getItem('is-teacher'); } }
